abilities.name: Water Cyclone
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy card from your Active Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rapids
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any.

data.name: Kingdra δ
rules: This Pokémon is both Fire Metal type.

abilities.name: Dragon Curse
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Kingdra is your Active Pokémon, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon with δ on its card. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Extra Flame
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Dragon Veil
abilities.text: As long as Kingdra is in play, each of your Active Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Hyper Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Sonic
attacks.text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Kingdra.

attacks.name: Dragon Tornado
attacks.text: If this attack doesn't Knock Out the Defending Pokémon, and if there are any Pokémon on your opponent's Bench, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Aqua Stream
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for as many Water Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and this attack does 10 damage for each Water Energy card you chose. Put those cards on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dragon Pump
attacks.text: You may discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stream Pump
attacks.text: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, return an Energy card attached to Kingdra to your hand.

data.flavorText: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.

data.name: Kingdra-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maelstrom-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Genetic Memory
attacks.text: Use any attack from Kingdra's Basic Pokémon card or Evolution card. (Kingdra doesn't have to pay for that attack's Energy cost.)

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, choose 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any, and discard it. If both are tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).

data.flavorText: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Brine
attacks.text: This attack does 90 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tornado Shot
attacks.text: Discard a Water Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

abilities.name: Water Cyclone
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy card from your Active Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rapids
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any.

data.name: Kingdra

ancientTrait.name: α Growth
ancientTrait.text: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon (except with an attack, Ability, or Trainer card), you may attach 2 Energy cards.

attacks.name: Gather Strength
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 4 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dragon Blast
attacks.text: Discard a Water and a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life-forms can survive.

data.name: Kingdra-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maelstrom-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Kingdra-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Big Storm
attacks.text: Discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Dragon Trail
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each basic Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Dragon Vortex
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the number of Water Energy cards and Lightning Energy cards in your discard pile. Then, shuffle all of those cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Tri Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It lives in caves on the seafloor and creates giant whirlpools every time it moves.

abilities.name: Spray Splash
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Dragon Steam
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Fire Pokémon in play, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 60.

data.name: Kingdra ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Genetic Memory
attacks.text: Use any attack from Kingdra ex's Basic Pokémon card or Stage 1 Evolution card. (Kingdra ex doesn't have to pay for that attack's Energy cost.)

attacks.name: Hydrocannon
attacks.text: Does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Kingdra ex but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life forms can survive.

attacks.text: Discard a Water Energy and a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Kingdra ex δ
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Extra Smoke
abilities.text: Any damage done to your Stage 2 Pokémon-ex by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Energy Link
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Kingdra ex.

attacks.name: Protective Swirl
attacks.text: Kingdra ex has no Weakness during your opponent's next turn.

rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Big Storm
attacks.text: Discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each basic Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Crystal Type
abilities.text: Whenever you attach a Water, Lightning, or Psychic basic Energy card from your hand to Kingdra, Kingdra's type (color) becomes the same as that Energy card type until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Aquabomb
attacks.text: Kingdra does 10 damage to itself. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance when Kingdra damages itself with this attack.)

attacks.name: Dual Burn
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each tails, discard 1 Energy card attached to Kingdra.

data.name: Kingdra

abilities.name: Deep Sea King
abilities.text: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, you may move any amount of Water Energy from that Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life forms can survive.

attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Kingdra

abilities.name: Seething Currents
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may have either player shuffle their hand and put it on the bottom of their deck. If that player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, they draw 4 cards.

data.flavorText: With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.

data.name: Kingdra

attacks.name: Whirltide
attacks.text: Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy card you find there. Then, discard those Energy cards and shuffle the other cards back into your deck. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a splendorous gleam to them that they've been given to royalty as gifts.

rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: King's Order
attacks.text: Put up to 3 Water Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.
